result.eng: As far as I know, this is true.
result.ga: A fhad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíor
result.orig: A fhad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíor
result.html: A fhad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíorAs far as I know, this is true.
result.ponchtml: A ḟad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíorAs far as I know, this is true.

result.eng: As you know, the deadline is tomorrow.
result.ga: Mar is eol duit amárach an spriocdháta
result.orig: Mar is eol duit amárach an spriocdháta
result.html: Mar is eol duit amárach an spriocdhátaAs you know, the deadline is tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Mar is eol duit amáraċ an spriocḋátaAs you know, the deadline is tomorrow.

result.eng: As we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.
result.ga: Mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn
result.orig: Mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn
result.html: Mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainnAs we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.
result.ponchtml: Mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na Naitsiṫe leis an bPolainnAs we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.
